rationale: Consistent use of design tokens ensures visual cohesion, easier theming, and reduces maintenance burden. The current implementation mixes iOS system blue (#007AFF) with a purple AI button, which clashes with the warm brass/copper palette defined in the design system.
problemSolved: pickButton uses backgroundColor: '#007AFF', aiButton uses backgroundColor: '#9C27B0', controlButton uses backgroundColor: '#333'. Edge handle circles use fill='#007AFF'. These colors don't match the brass accent theme (colors.accent.brass: '#E8C547').
